article_text:
Sioux Falls, SD

It's that time of year again - time for farmers from within 150 miles of Sioux Falls to bring out their fresh fruit and vegetables to sell at the Falls Park Farmer's Market.

The 2015 Falls Park Farmer's Market opens Saturday, May 2. Dozens of farmers will be set up at 2nd Avenue and Falls Park Drive from 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. every Saturday from now until October.

Some produce to expect on opening day will include early spring produce like lettuce, radishes and turnips. Potted plants, flowers, and grasses will also be up for sale.
